channel.title: Moddeling Help
channel.description:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,445292.0.html Please read this, now i know this current one is in the wrong section. I need help because i'm stuck, please red the last post. I'll make it easier and post it here.
[quote author=the wanderer link=topic=445292.msg3269398#msg3269398 date=1279087295] Go in edit panel and click sel all. Then go to the drop down menus and go to Selected>Mirror. Then select the axis you wish to mirror it on. Might take a bit to get used to the different axis's. [/quote] What is "Sel All" Maybe tell like Edit>whatever>otherthing>thisthing>etc> Can yo tell like that with all whole letters, because i'm conmfused. [hr] I've done this. [code]Edit>Select All>Selected>[/code] When i go to click "Mirror" i can't click it look. [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/2vmab6c.jpg[/img]

[quote author=the wanderer link=topic=445292.msg3269398#msg3269398 date=1279087295] Go in edit panel and click sel all. Then go to the drop down menus and go to Selected>Mirror. Then select the axis you wish to mirror it on. Might take a bit to get used to the different axis's. [/quote] What is "Sel All"

Maybe tell like

Edit>whatever>otherthing>thisthing>etc>

Can yo tell like that with all whole letters, because i’m conmfused.

I’ve done this.

When i go to click “Mirror” i can’t click it look.
